I figured it would be fun to make a super fast sneaker, so here's your exceptionally basic Monk build for Arelith. I gave it to someone already, so it's in the process of being tested.

PvM and PvP, although mostly PvM

Has to be LN or LE.

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content: There is one problem I can spot right away: This sneaker doesn't have Sneaks

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
Is there a reason why you take 6 levels of SD? You only need SD5 for ED.
A fifth level of fighter taken in epic levels can give you EWS for 4 more damage if taken on a "feat" level.

posts.author: Nokteronoth
posts.content:
On Arelith, SD gives +hide on even levels, so it's got a bit of a bonus to keep that even. Although if there is enough Hide gear, one could swap it for the Fighter level, yes.

~Nok
